settings.title: Contact us
settings.body:
At EzyDog, we are committed to providing top-notch customer service. Whether you have a question, need assistance with a product or just want to say hello, we're here to ensure you get the best possible service and shopping experience. There are several ways to get in touch with us.

Our dedicated customer support team is ready to assist you with any enquiries, questions or product education you may want to learn. We take pride in our quick response times and friendly service. You can reach us via:
settings.content_1: For immediate assistance, our live chat feature is available during business hours. Click the chat icon in the bottom corner of your screen, and you'll be connected with a knowledgeable Ezydog representative.
settings.content_2: Call us at our HQ on +61 7 5508 2700 during our business hours and one of our representatives will be happy to assist you.

settings.content_1: Send us an email at enquiries@ezydog.com.au and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.
settings.content_2: A quick consultation with one of our product experts can ensure you make the right choice of product perfect for your dog’s personality or breed. We offer a consultation service where you can book a time for us to give you a call.

settings.content_1: Before reaching out to us, you might want to check our FAQ section. We've compiled answers to common questions about our products, orders, shipping, and more. It's a great resource for finding quick solutions to your inquiries.
settings.content_2: If you want to shop our products in person, we have over 500 stockists Australia wide (and globally too) Please use our Store Locator to find a store near you.

settings.content_1: Don't forget to connect with us on social media for the latest updates, product releases, and special offers. You can find us on Instagram and Facebook. Don’t forget to sign up to our newsletter too for VIP service and special offers.
settings.content_2: We value your feedback and welcome any suggestions to improve our products and services. Feel free to share your thoughts with us through our online feedback form or by emailing enquiries@ezydog.com.au

settings.text: At EzyDog, our mission is to make your life with your dog easier and more enjoyable. We're here to support you every step of the way. Thank you for choosing EzyDog, where their comfort and your satisfaction are our priorities.

At EzyDog, our mission is to make your life with your dog easier and more enjoyable. We're here to support you every step of the way. Thank you for choosing EzyDog, where their comfort and your satisfaction are our priorities.We look forward to hearing from you!
